title: Understanding Psychological Abuse
text: Psychological abuse involves actions that harm an individual's mental well-being. It can manifest in various forms, such as verbal attacks, manipulation, or isolation.

title: Effects of Psychological Abuse
text: Consider the potential effects of psychological abuse, such as anxiety, depression, and decreased self-esteem. These are indicators of psychological harm.

hintAnswer: Subjecting or exposing another individual to behavior that can result in psychological harm, such as anxiety, chronic depression, decreased $$self-esteem$$, or even $$post-traumatic$$ stress disorder
